The version attribute is marked required in the extension point schema, so you should have seen an error in the problems view regarding this.

Regardless, there was a bug in runtime handling of errors in the facets extension point that I fixed so that you don't get an NPE. The error log already contained the error message saying that the version attribute was missing.
Released the fix for the next I-build.
I just tried removing the version attribute and still no error in the Problems view.
The error would be in the Error Log view, not the Problems View. Also, what build did you try this with? The change went into the 1.5 line.

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP resolved bugs from the 1.0.x and 1.5.0 timeframe.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
